WorkItem.Description:
It would be useful if the documentation featured a cross reference showing the different features that are supported by the different readers/writers
 
For example: Excel5 reader/writer doesn't support formulae using functions from the advanced toolpack, whereas Excel2007 reader/writer does support these functions; and Excel5 reader/writer doesn't support certain operators (eg %) in formulae.
 
A simple cross-reference table in the documentation could advise users of exactly what can and can't be done with the different readers/writers
WorkItem.Summary: Cross Reference of Features supported by different readers/writers in Documentation

Comments.Message:
For each feature one can state if it is supported by reader/writer/core.
Maybe such list is easiest to maintain in a spreadsheet?

Some inspiration how to such cross reference of features might look:
http://www.webdevout.net/browser-support-css#css2standards
Started putting together Functionality Cross-Reference.xls in /Documentation
